data.system_settings: Macbook Pro 13" (2017 - With Touchbar), macOS High Sierra - Version 10.13.4
data.client_settings: Discord Canary for Mac OS - 0.0.193 (0.0.193) - Build Number: 17063
data.actual_result: The 'this channel doesn't have any pins' screen appears for a few seconds before pins load, without the loading symbol.
data.expected_result: A loading symbol should appear as it loads, or pins should appear immediately.
data.short_description: When clicking a pinned message button with unread pins, the "no results' page appears for a couple of seconds before the pins load
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server where there is a channel with unread pins - Click on the pin button  - Observe the results page
